subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: After spending much of the past month maintaining that he was not dwelling on his disappointment at the U.S. Open, Johnson opened with a seven-under-par 65 on the Old Course at St. Andrews.
snippet: After spending much of the past month maintaining that he was not dwelling on his disappointment at the U.S. Open, Johnson opened with a seven-under-par 65 on the Old Course at St. Andrews.
